
state={
	id=253	# Inner Mongolia
	name="STATE_253"

	history={
		owner = ROC
		add_core_of = ROC
		buildings = {
			infrastructure = 1
		}
		set_variable = { division_limit_infrastructure_weight = 5 } # 5 because theres not much around here
		victory_points = { 7610 5 }	# Hangu'erhezhen
		
		set_variable = { state_religion_buddhism = 0.05 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_shinto = 0 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_christianity = 0.05 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_taoism = 0.3 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_confucianism = 0.5 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_secularism = 0.1 }
		set_variable = { state_religion_cthulhu = 0 }
	}

	provinces={
		75 135 208 305 321 376 394 488 493 541 558 619 644 680 725 732 812 837 930 939 1043 1057 1113 1148 1154 1182 1187 1188 1294 1340 1395 1444 1450 1451 1456 1470 1508 1509 1537 1580 1647 1648 1650 1758 1764 1806 1814 1899 1971 1985 1999 2019 2031 2120 2128 2137 2247 2274 2279 2303 2312 2364 2390 2391 2463 2469 2485 2553 2659 2677 2682 2775 2806 2850 2902 2903 2960 2979 3049 3107 3133 3161 3187 3220 3303 3335 3386 3471 3634 3713 3717 3721 3746 3759 3775 3847 3931 3952 4018 4026 4043 4104 4129 4173 4185 4225 4250 4251 4292 4396 4510 4555 4572 4582 4618 4637 4697 4753 4765 4769 4826 5021 5026 5046 5081 5248 5254 5337 5366 5418 5444 5446 5454 5504 5541 5682 5710 5818 5837 5859 5904 5920 6043 6086 6114 6123 6138 6246 6253 6338 6343 6395 6419 6437 6449 6552 6582 6590 6597 6622 6650 6697 6726 6750 6871 6973 7055 7079 7088 7173 7174 7222 7238 7246 7266 7288 7306 7313 7324 7333 7338 7359 7363 7373 7382 7395 7396 7400 7410 7415 7422 7424 7441 7443 7448 7460 7476 7484 7489 7515 7530 7537 7549 7566 7573 7580 7584 7607 7608 7610 7612 7618 7624 7633 7634 7650 7655 7658 7659 7684 7688 7706 7707 7709 7718 7732 7740 7741 7761 7765 7791 7803 7805 7813 7815 7849 7857 7859 7869 7870 7901 7926 7947 7965 7989 
	}
	manpower=117227

	state_category=rural
